chapter.section:
Here a list of known bugs/issues:
math errors
Avoidable math errors when exceeding track values range Frame scale: zooming too much lead to numeric errors Grid (): in some conditions fails, imprecise values (log scale)
Directive #end does not work Main form captures keydown event of child forms, for example keystrokes trigger plot actions : rare wrong time measures for kinetic pan Switching between modes: improper behaviour involving Legend (): ehmm, is somewhat rough, sometimes its position is reset function is an incomplete draft is an incomplete draft

chapter.section:
The project is quite inactive now. However here is a wishlist and some planned features:
&fix; known bugs Track classes hierarchy, support complex tracks, polar plots, calculus operators Markers: intelligent from measured quantities, set from clipboard
Renderer
Improve performance using directly winAPI bypassing &VCL; wrapper Improve legend
Exporter
Saved ∓ file format (mpx file format) Save dialog: Checkbox "current frame only" compressed archives Exporting plot to &SVG; file
Importer
Import data from mfile,xml,csv; fill columns or directly frames? (cls_StreamParser hierarchy) Import from clipboard (excel) Improve file read speed by buffering (TStream hierarchy) Import from compressed files (TStream hierarchy) Import data from other sources than files: serial line, etc (TStream hierarchy) Import data from binary files (see some popular formats) Introduce directives for frames and track style?
Elaborations
Better tracks elaboration forms (math operators,resampling,filters), undo real tracks: convolution; complex tracks: fft, rotation apply only to abscissa selection (EditMode) A parser to execute tracks elaboration of expression like track3=track1+track2^2 Plugin framework to implement tracks operators (filters, etc) and importers/exporters Integrate and use &lua; language
Other
Intelligent rescale of abscissa time values Detect track click on legend, smart legend placing OLE drag and drop of frames between multiple program instances Identify calling shell instance and print messages there Training tutorial
